                                                          # MyBatisè¯¦è§£ - sqlSessionæ‰§è¡Œæµç¨‹

                                                          å‰é¢çš„ç« èŠ‚ä¸»è¦è®²mybatiså¦‚ä½•è§£æé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œè¿™äº›éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¡æ€§çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚ä»æœ¬ç« å¼€å§‹è®²è§£åŠ¨æ€çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œå®ƒä»¬è·Ÿåº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºå¯¹mybatisçš„è°ƒç”¨å¯†åˆ‡ç›¸å…³ã€‚

                                                          # 1. sqlSessionFactory ä¸ SqlSession

                                                          é€šè¿‡å‰é¢çš„ç« èŠ‚å¯¹äºmybatis çš„ä»‹ç»åŠä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå¤§å®¶éƒ½èƒ½ä½“ä¼šåˆ°SqlSessionçš„é‡è¦æ€§äº†å§ï¼Œæ²¡é”™ï¼Œä»è¡¨é¢ä¸Šæ¥çœ‹ï¼Œå’±ä»¬éƒ½æ˜¯é€šè¿‡SqlSessionå»æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥ï¼ˆæ³¨æ„ï¼šæ˜¯ä»è¡¨é¢çœ‹ï¼Œå®é™…çš„å¾…ä¼šå„¿å°±ä¼šè®²ï¼‰ã€‚

                                                          æ­£å¦‚å…¶åï¼ŒSqlsessionå¯¹åº”ç€ä¸€æ¬¡æ•°æ®åº“ä¼šè¯ã€‚ç”±äºæ•°æ®åº“ä¼šè¯ä¸æ˜¯æ°¸ä¹…çš„ï¼Œå› æ­¤Sqlsessionçš„ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸä¹Ÿä¸åº”è¯¥æ˜¯æ°¸ä¹…çš„ï¼Œç›¸åï¼Œåœ¨ä½ æ¯æ¬¡è®¿é—®æ•°æ®åº“æ—¶éƒ½éœ€è¦åˆ›å»ºå®ƒï¼ˆå½“ç„¶å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯è¯´åœ¨Sqlsessioné‡Œåªèƒ½æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡sqlï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥æ‰§è¡Œå¤šæ¬¡ï¼Œå½“ä¸€æ—¦å…³é—­äº†Sqlsessionå°±éœ€è¦é‡æ–°åˆ›å»ºå®ƒï¼‰ã€‚

                                                          é‚£ä¹ˆå’±ä»¬å°±å…ˆçœ‹çœ‹æ˜¯æ€ä¹ˆè·å–SqlSessionçš„å§ï¼š

                                                          é¦–å…ˆï¼ŒSqlSessionFactoryBuilderå»è¯»å–mybatisçš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œç„¶åbuildä¸€ä¸ªDefaultSqlSessionFactoryã€‚æºç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                           /**
  * ä¸€ç³»åˆ—çš„æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•æœ€ç»ˆéƒ½ä¼šè°ƒç”¨æœ¬æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸ºReaderæ—¶ä¼šè°ƒç”¨æœ¬æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªInputStreamæ–¹æ³•ä¸æ­¤å¯¹åº”ï¼‰
  * @param reader
  * @param environment
  * @param properties
  * @return
  */
 public SqlSessionFactory build(Reader reader, String environment, Properties properties) {
   try {
     //é€šè¿‡XMLConfigBuilderè§£æé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œè§£æçš„é…ç½®ç›¸å…³ä¿¡æ¯éƒ½ä¼šå°è£…ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªConfigurationå¯¹è±¡
     XMLConfigBuilder parser = new XMLConfigBuilder(reader, environment, properties);
     //è¿™å„¿åˆ›å»ºDefaultSessionFactoryå¯¹è±¡
     return build(parser.parse());
   } catch (Exception e) {
     throw ExceptionFactory.wrapException("Error building SqlSession.", e);
   } finally {
     ErrorContext.instance().reset();
     try {
       reader.close();
     } catch (IOException e) {
       // Intentionally ignore. Prefer previous error.
     }
   }
 }

 public SqlSessionFactory build(Configuration config) {
   return new DefaultSqlSessionFactory(config);
 }

                                                          å½“æˆ‘ä»¬è·å–åˆ°SqlSessionFactoryä¹‹åï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡SqlSessionFactoryå»è·å–SqlSessionå¯¹è±¡ã€‚æºç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                          /**
  * é€šå¸¸ä¸€ç³»åˆ—openSessionæ–¹æ³•æœ€ç»ˆéƒ½ä¼šè°ƒç”¨æœ¬æ–¹æ³•
  * @param execType 
  * @param level
  * @param autoCommit
  * @return
  */
 private SqlSession openSessionFromDataSource(ExecutorType execType, TransactionIsolationLevel level, boolean autoCommit) {
   Transaction tx = null;
   try {
     //é€šè¿‡Confugurationå¯¹è±¡å»è·å–Mybatisç›¸å…³é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯, Environmentå¯¹è±¡åŒ…å«äº†æ•°æ®æºå’Œäº‹åŠ¡çš„é…ç½®
     final Environment environment = configuration.getEnvironment();
     final TransactionFactory transactionFactory = getTransactionFactoryFromEnvironment(environment);
     tx = transactionFactory.newTransaction(environment.getDataSource(), level, autoCommit);
     //ä¹‹å‰è¯´äº†ï¼Œä»è¡¨é¢ä¸Šæ¥çœ‹ï¼Œå’±ä»¬æ˜¯ç”¨sqlSessionåœ¨æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥ï¼Œ å®é™…å‘¢ï¼Œå…¶å®æ˜¯é€šè¿‡excutoræ‰§è¡Œï¼Œ excutoræ˜¯å¯¹äºStatementçš„å°è£…
     final Executor executor = configuration.newExecutor(tx, execType);
     //å…³é”®çœ‹è¿™å„¿ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºäº†ä¸€ä¸ªDefaultSqlSessionå¯¹è±¡
     return new DefaultSqlSession(configuration, executor, autoCommit);
   } catch (Exception e) {
     closeTransaction(tx); // may have fetched a connection so lets call close()
     throw ExceptionFactory.wrapException("Error opening session.  Cause: " + e, e);
   } finally {
     ErrorContext.instance().reset();
   }
 }

                                                          é€šè¿‡ä»¥ä¸Šæ­¥éª¤ï¼Œå’±ä»¬å·²ç»å¾—åˆ°SqlSessionå¯¹è±¡äº†ã€‚æ¥ä¸‹æ¥å°±æ˜¯è¯¥å¹²å˜›å¹²å˜›å»äº†ï¼ˆè¯è¯´è¿˜èƒ½å¹²å˜›ï¼Œå½“ç„¶æ˜¯æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥å’¯ï¼‰ã€‚çœ‹äº†ä¸Šé¢ï¼Œå’±ä»¬ä¹Ÿå›æƒ³ä¸€ä¸‹ä¹‹å‰å†™çš„Demoï¼š

                                                          SqlSessionFactory sessionFactory = null;  
String resource = "mybatis-conf.xml";  
try {
    //SqlSessionFactoryBuilderè¯»å–é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶
   sessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(Resources.getResourceAsReader(resource));
} catch (IOException e) {  
   e.printStackTrace();  
}    
//é€šè¿‡SqlSessionFactoryè·å–SqlSession
SqlSession sqlSession = sessionFactory.openSession();

                                                          åˆ›å»ºSqlsessionçš„åœ°æ–¹åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œé‚£å°±æ˜¯SqlsessionFactoryçš„openSessionæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

                                                          public SqlSessionopenSession() {  
    return openSessionFromDataSource(configuration.getDefaultExecutorType(),null, false);  
}

                                                          æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°å®é™…åˆ›å»ºSqlSessionçš„åœ°æ–¹æ˜¯openSessionFromDataSourceï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                          private SqlSession openSessionFromDataSource(ExecutorType execType, TransactionIsolationLevel level, boolean autoCommit) {  
 
    Connection connection = null;  
 
    try {  
 
        final Environment environment = configuration.getEnvironment();  
 
        final DataSource dataSource = getDataSourceFromEnvironment(environment);  
        
        // MyBatiså¯¹äº‹åŠ¡çš„å¤„ç†ç›¸å¯¹ç®€å•ï¼ŒTransactionIsolationLevelä¸­å®šä¹‰äº†å‡ ç§éš”ç¦»çº§åˆ«ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸æ”¯æŒå†…åµŒäº‹åŠ¡è¿™æ ·è¾ƒå¤æ‚çš„åœºæ™¯ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶ç”±äºå…¶æ˜¯æŒä¹…å±‚çš„ç¼˜æ•…ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥çœŸæ­£åœ¨åº”ç”¨å¼€å‘ä¸­ä¼šå§”æ‰˜Springæ¥å¤„ç†äº‹åŠ¡å®ç°çœŸæ­£çš„ä¸å¼€å‘è€…éš”ç¦»ã€‚åˆ†æäº‹åŠ¡çš„å®ç°æ˜¯ä¸ªå…¥å£ï¼Œå€Ÿæ­¤å¯ä»¥äº†è§£ä¸å°‘JDBCè§„èŒƒæ–¹é¢çš„äº‹æƒ…ã€‚
        TransactionFactory transactionFactory = getTransactionFactoryFromEnvironment(environment);  
 
        connection = dataSource.getConnection();  
 
        if (level != null) {  
            connection.setTransactionIsolation(level.getLevel());
        }  
 
        connection = wrapConnection(connection);  
 
        Transaction tx = transactionFactory.newTransaction(connection,autoCommit);  
 
        Executorexecutor = configuration.newExecutor(tx, execType);  
 
        return newDefaultSqlSession(configuration, executor, autoCommit);  
 
    } catch (Exceptione) {  
        closeConnection(connection);  
        throwExceptionFactory.wrapException("Error opening session.  Cause: " + e, e);  
    } finally {
        ErrorContext.instance().reset();
    }
}

                                                          å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œåˆ›å»ºsqlsessionç»è¿‡äº†ä»¥ä¸‹å‡ ä¸ªä¸»è¦æ­¥éª¤ï¼š

                                                          • ä»é…ç½®ä¸­è·å–Environmentï¼›
                                                          • ä»Environmentä¸­å–å¾—DataSourceï¼›
                                                          • ä»Environmentä¸­å–å¾—TransactionFactoryï¼›
                                                          • ä»DataSourceé‡Œè·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡Connectionï¼›
                                                          • åœ¨å–å¾—çš„æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥ä¸Šåˆ›å»ºäº‹åŠ¡å¯¹è±¡Transactionï¼›
                                                          • åˆ›å»ºExecutorå¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆè¯¥å¯¹è±¡éå¸¸é‡è¦ï¼Œäº‹å®ä¸Šsqlsessionçš„æ‰€æœ‰æ“ä½œéƒ½æ˜¯é€šè¿‡å®ƒå®Œæˆçš„ï¼‰ï¼›
                                                          • åˆ›å»ºsqlsessionå¯¹è±¡ã€‚

                                                          SqlSessionå’±ä»¬ä¹Ÿæ‹¿åˆ°äº†ï¼Œå’±ä»¬å¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨SqlSessionä¸­ä¸€ç³»åˆ—çš„select..., insert..., update..., delete...æ–¹æ³•è½»æ¾è‡ªå¦‚çš„è¿›è¡ŒCRUDæ“ä½œäº†ã€‚å°±è¿™æ ·ï¼Ÿé‚£å’±é…ç½®çš„æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶å»å“ªå„¿äº†ï¼Ÿåˆ«æ€¥ï¼Œå’±ä»¬æ¥ç€å¾€ä¸‹çœ‹ã€‚

                                                          # 2. åˆ©å™¨ä¹‹MapperProxy

                                                          åœ¨mybatisä¸­ï¼Œé€šè¿‡MapperProxyåŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†å’±ä»¬çš„daoï¼Œ ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´ï¼Œ å½“å’±ä»¬æ‰§è¡Œè‡ªå·±å†™çš„daoé‡Œé¢çš„æ–¹æ³•çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå…¶å®æ˜¯å¯¹åº”çš„mapperProxyåœ¨ä»£ç†ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆï¼Œå’±ä»¬å°±çœ‹çœ‹æ€ä¹ˆè·å–MapperProxyå¯¹è±¡å§ï¼š

                                                          é€šè¿‡SqlSessionä»Configurationä¸­è·å–ã€‚æºç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                           /**
  * ä»€ä¹ˆéƒ½ä¸åšï¼Œç›´æ¥å»configurationä¸­æ‰¾ï¼Œ å“¥å°±æ˜¯è¿™ä¹ˆä»»æ€§
  */
 @Override
 public <T> T getMapper(Class<T> type) {
   return configuration.<T>getMapper(type, this);
 }
SqlSessionæŠŠåŒ…è¢±ç”©ç»™äº†Configuration, æ¥ä¸‹æ¥å°±çœ‹çœ‹Configurationã€‚æºç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
 /**
  * çƒ«æ‰‹çš„å±±èŠ‹ï¼Œä¿ºä¸è¦ï¼Œä½ æ‰¾mapperRegistryå»è¦
  * @param type
  * @param sqlSession
  * @return
  */
 public <T> T getMapper(Class<T> type, SqlSession sqlSession) {
   return mapperRegistry.getMapper(type, sqlSession);
 }
Configurationä¸è¦è¿™çƒ«æ‰‹çš„å±±èŠ‹ï¼Œæ¥ç€ç”©ç»™äº†MapperRegistryï¼Œ é‚£å’±çœ‹çœ‹MapperRegistryã€‚ æºç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
 /**
  * çƒ‚æ´»å‡€è®©æˆ‘æ¥åšäº†ï¼Œæ²¡æ³•äº†ï¼Œä¸‹é¢æ²¡äººäº†ï¼Œæˆ‘ä¸åšè°æ¥åš
  * @param type
  * @param sqlSession
  * @return
  */
 @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
 public <T> T getMapper(Class<T> type, SqlSession sqlSession) {
   //èƒ½å·æ‡’çš„å°±å·æ‡’ï¼Œä¿ºæŠŠç²—æ´»äº¤ç»™MapperProxyFactoryå»åš
   final MapperProxyFactory<T> mapperProxyFactory = (MapperProxyFactory<T>) knownMappers.get(type);
   if (mapperProxyFactory == null) {
     throw new BindingException("Type " + type + " is not known to the MapperRegistry.");
   }
   try {
     //å…³é”®åœ¨è¿™å„¿
     return mapperProxyFactory.newInstance(sqlSession);
   } catch (Exception e) {
     throw new BindingException("Error getting mapper instance. Cause: " + e, e);
   }
 }

                                                          MapperProxyFactoryæ˜¯ä¸ªè‹¦Bçš„äººï¼Œç²—æ´»æœ€ç»ˆäº¤ç»™å®ƒå»åšäº†ã€‚å’±ä»¬çœ‹çœ‹æºç ï¼š

                                                           /**
  * åˆ«äººè™æˆ‘åƒç™¾éï¼Œæˆ‘å¾…åˆ«äººå¦‚åˆæ‹
  * @param mapperProxy
  * @return
  */
 @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
 protected T newInstance(MapperProxy<T> mapperProxy) {
   //åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æˆ‘ä»¬å†™çš„daoæ¥å£
   return (T) Proxy.newProxyInstance(mapperInterface.getClassLoader(), new Class[] { mapperInterface }, mapperProxy);
 }
 
 public T newInstance(SqlSession sqlSession) {
   final MapperProxy<T> mapperProxy = new MapperProxy<T>(sqlSession, mapperInterface, methodCache);
   return newInstance(mapperProxy);
 }

                                                          é€šè¿‡ä»¥ä¸Šçš„åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†ï¼Œå’±ä»¬å°±å¯ä»¥æ–¹ä¾¿åœ°ä½¿ç”¨daoæ¥å£å•¦ï¼Œ å°±åƒä¹‹å‰å’±ä»¬å†™çš„demoé‚£æ ·ï¼š

                                                          UserDao userMapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserDao.class);  
User insertUser = new User();

                                                          è¿™ä¸‹æ–¹ä¾¿å¤šäº†å§ï¼Œ å‘µå‘µï¼Œ è²Œä¼¼mybatisçš„æºç å°±è¿™ä¹ˆä¸€å›äº‹å„¿å•Šã€‚å…·ä½“è¯¦ç»†ä»‹ç»ï¼Œè¯·å‚è§MyBatis Mapper æ¥å£å¦‚ä½•é€šè¿‡JDKåŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æ¥åŒ…è£…SqlSession æºç åˆ†æã€‚åˆ«æ€¥ï¼Œè¿˜æ²¡å®Œï¼Œ å’±ä»¬è¿˜æ²¡çœ‹å…·ä½“æ˜¯æ€ä¹ˆæ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥çš„å‘¢ã€‚

                                                          # 3. Executor

                                                          Executorä¸Sqlsessionçš„å…³ç³»å°±åƒå¸‚é•¿ä¸ä¹¦è®°ï¼ŒSqlsessionåªæ˜¯ä¸ªé—¨é¢ï¼ŒçœŸæ­£å¹²äº‹çš„æ˜¯Executorï¼ŒSqlsessionå¯¹æ•°æ®åº“çš„æ“ä½œéƒ½æ˜¯é€šè¿‡Executoræ¥å®Œæˆçš„ã€‚ä¸Sqlsessionä¸€æ ·ï¼ŒExecutorä¹Ÿæ˜¯åŠ¨æ€åˆ›å»ºçš„ï¼š

                                                          • Executoråˆ›å»ºçš„æºä»£ç ï¼š
                                                          public Executor newExecutor(Transaction transaction, ExecutorType executorType) {  

    executorType = executorType == null ? defaultExecutorType : executorType;  

    executorType = executorType == null ?ExecutorType.SIMPLE : executorType;  

    Executor executor;  

    if(ExecutorType.BATCH == executorType) {
        executor = new BatchExecutor(this,transaction);
    } else if(ExecutorType.REUSE == executorType) {
        executor = new ReuseExecutor(this,transaction);  
    } else {  
        executor = new SimpleExecutor(this, transaction);
    }

    if (cacheEnabled) {
        executor = new CachingExecutor(executor);  
    }
    executor = (Executor) interceptorChain.pluginAll(executor);  
    return executor;  
}

                                                          å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸å¼€å¯cacheçš„è¯ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºçš„Executoråªæ˜¯3ä¸­åŸºç¡€ç±»å‹ä¹‹ä¸€ï¼ŒBatchExecutorä¸“é—¨ç”¨äºæ‰§è¡Œæ‰¹é‡sqlæ“ä½œï¼ŒReuseExecutorä¼šé‡ç”¨statementæ‰§è¡Œsqlæ“ä½œï¼ŒSimpleExecutoråªæ˜¯ç®€å•æ‰§è¡Œsqlæ²¡æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆç‰¹åˆ«çš„ã€‚å¼€å¯cacheçš„è¯ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤æ˜¯å¼€å¯çš„å¹¶ä¸”æ²¡æœ‰ä»»ä½•ç†ç”±å»å…³é—­å®ƒï¼‰ï¼Œå°±ä¼šåˆ›å»ºCachingExecutorï¼Œå®ƒä»¥å‰é¢åˆ›å»ºçš„Executorä½œä¸ºå”¯ä¸€å‚æ•°ã€‚CachingExecutoråœ¨æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®åº“å‰å…ˆæŸ¥æ‰¾ç¼“å­˜ï¼Œè‹¥æ²¡æ‰¾åˆ°çš„è¯è°ƒç”¨delegateï¼ˆå°±æ˜¯æ„é€ æ—¶ä¼ å…¥çš„Executorå¯¹è±¡ï¼‰ä»æ•°æ®åº“æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œå¹¶å°†æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æœå­˜å…¥ç¼“å­˜ä¸­ã€‚

                                                          Executorå¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¯ä»¥è¢«æ’ä»¶æ‹¦æˆªçš„ï¼Œå¦‚æœå®šä¹‰äº†é’ˆå¯¹Executorç±»å‹çš„æ’ä»¶ï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆç”Ÿæˆçš„Executorå¯¹è±¡æ˜¯è¢«å„ä¸ªæ’ä»¶æ’å…¥åçš„ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡ã€‚

                                                          æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œå’±ä»¬æ‰è¦çœŸæ­£å»çœ‹sqlçš„æ‰§è¡Œè¿‡ç¨‹äº†ã€‚ä¸Šé¢ï¼Œå’±ä»¬æ‹¿åˆ°äº†MapperProxy, æ¯ä¸ªMapperProxyå¯¹åº”ä¸€ä¸ªdaoæ¥å£ï¼Œ é‚£ä¹ˆå’±ä»¬åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼ŒMapperProxyæ˜¯æ€ä¹ˆåšçš„å‘¢ï¼Ÿ æºç å¥‰ä¸Šï¼š

                                                          • MapperProxy

                                                          æˆ‘ä»¬çŸ¥é“å¯¹è¢«ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹æ³•çš„è®¿é—®éƒ½ä¼šè½å®åˆ°ä»£ç†è€…çš„invokeä¸Šæ¥ï¼ŒMapperProxyçš„invokeå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                            /**
   * MapperProxyåœ¨æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶ä¼šè§¦å‘æ­¤æ–¹æ³•
   */
  @Override
  public Object invoke(Object proxy, Method method, Object[] args) throws Throwable {
    if (Object.class.equals(method.getDeclaringClass())) {
      try {
        return method.invoke(this, args);
      } catch (Throwable t) {
        throw ExceptionUtil.unwrapThrowable(t);
      }
    }
    final MapperMethod mapperMethod = cachedMapperMethod(method);
    //äºŒè¯ä¸è¯´ï¼Œä¸»è¦äº¤ç»™MapperMethodè‡ªå·±å»ç®¡
    return mapperMethod.execute(sqlSession, args);
  }
                                                          • MapperMethod

                                                          å°±åƒæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ†å‘è€…ï¼Œä»–æ ¹æ®å‚æ•°å’Œè¿”å›å€¼ç±»å‹é€‰æ‹©ä¸åŒçš„sqlsessionæ–¹æ³•æ¥æ‰§è¡Œã€‚è¿™æ ·mapperå¯¹è±¡ä¸sqlsessionå°±çœŸæ­£çš„å…³è”èµ·æ¥äº†ã€‚

                                                            /**
   * çœ‹ç€ä»£ç ä¸å°‘ï¼Œä¸è¿‡å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯å…ˆåˆ¤æ–­CRUDç±»å‹ï¼Œç„¶åæ ¹æ®ç±»å‹å»é€‰æ‹©åˆ°åº•æ‰§è¡ŒsqlSessionä¸­çš„å“ªä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œç»•äº†ä¸€åœˆï¼Œåˆè½¬å›sqlSessionäº†
   * @param sqlSession
   * @param args
   * @return
   */
  public Object execute(SqlSession sqlSession, Object[] args) {
    Object result;
    if (SqlCommandType.INSERT == command.getType()) {
      Object param = method.convertArgsToSqlCommandParam(args);
      result = rowCountResult(sqlSession.insert(command.getName(), param));
    } else if (SqlCommandType.UPDATE == command.getType()) {
      Object param = method.convertArgsToSqlCommandParam(args);
      result = rowCountResult(sqlSession.update(command.getName(), param));
    } else if (SqlCommandType.DELETE == command.getType()) {
      Object param = method.convertArgsToSqlCommandParam(args);
      result = rowCountResult(sqlSession.delete(command.getName(), param));
    } else if (SqlCommandType.SELECT == command.getType()) {
      if (method.returnsVoid() && method.hasResultHandler()) {
        executeWithResultHandler(sqlSession, args);
        result = null;
      } else if (method.returnsMany()) {
        result = executeForMany(sqlSession, args);
      } else if (method.returnsMap()) {
        result = executeForMap(sqlSession, args);
      } else {
        Object param = method.convertArgsToSqlCommandParam(args);
        result = sqlSession.selectOne(command.getName(), param);
      }
    } else {
      throw new BindingException("Unknown execution method for: " + command.getName());
    }
    if (result == null && method.getReturnType().isPrimitive() && !method.returnsVoid()) {
      throw new BindingException("Mapper method '" + command.getName() 
          + " attempted to return null from a method with a primitive return type (" + method.getReturnType() + ").");
    }
    return result;
  }

                                                          æ—¢ç„¶åˆå›åˆ°SqlSessionäº†ï¼Œå‰é¢æåˆ°è¿‡ï¼Œsqlsessionåªæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªé—¨é¢ï¼ŒçœŸæ­£å‘æŒ¥ä½œç”¨çš„æ˜¯executorï¼Œå¯¹sqlsessionæ–¹æ³•çš„è®¿é—®æœ€ç»ˆéƒ½ä¼šè½åˆ°executorçš„ç›¸åº”æ–¹æ³•ä¸Šå»ã€‚Executoråˆ†æˆä¸¤å¤§ç±»ï¼Œä¸€ç±»æ˜¯CacheExecutorï¼Œå¦ä¸€ç±»æ˜¯æ™®é€šExecutorã€‚Executorçš„åˆ›å»ºå‰é¢å·²ç»ä»‹ç»äº†ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå’±ä»¬å°±çœ‹çœ‹SqlSessionçš„CRUDæ–¹æ³•äº†ï¼Œä¸ºäº†çœäº‹ï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯å°±é€‰æ‹©å…¶ä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•æ¥åšåˆ†æå§ã€‚è¿™å„¿ï¼Œå’±ä»¬é€‰æ‹©äº†selectListæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

                                                            public <E> List<E> selectList(String statement, Object parameter, RowBounds rowBounds) {
    try {
      MappedStatement ms = configuration.getMappedStatement(statement);
      //CRUDå®é™…ä¸Šæ˜¯äº¤ç»™Excetorå»å¤„ç†ï¼Œ excutorå…¶å®ä¹Ÿåªæ˜¯ç©¿äº†ä¸ªé©¬ç”²è€Œå·²ï¼Œå°æ ·ï¼Œåˆ«ä»¥ä¸ºç©¿ä¸ªé©¬ç”²æˆ‘å°±ä¸è®¤è¯†ä½ å˜ï¼
      return executor.query(ms, wrapCollection(parameter), rowBounds, Executor.NO_RESULT_HANDLER);
    } catch (Exception e) {
      throw ExceptionFactory.wrapException("Error querying database.  Cause: " + e, e);
    } finally {
      ErrorContext.instance().reset();
    }
  }
                                                          • CacheExecutor

                                                          CacheExecutoræœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªé‡è¦å±æ€§delegateï¼Œå®ƒä¿å­˜çš„æ˜¯æŸç±»æ™®é€šçš„Executorï¼Œå€¼åœ¨æ„ç…§æ—¶ä¼ å…¥ã€‚æ‰§è¡Œæ•°æ®åº“updateæ“ä½œæ—¶ï¼Œå®ƒç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨delegateçš„updateæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œqueryæ–¹æ³•æ—¶å…ˆå°è¯•ä»cacheä¸­å–å€¼ï¼Œå–ä¸åˆ°å†è°ƒç”¨delegateçš„æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¹¶å°†æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æœå­˜å…¥cacheä¸­ã€‚ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                          public List query(MappedStatement ms, Object parameterObject, RowBounds rowBounds,ResultHandler resultHandler) throws SQLException {  
    if (ms != null) {  
        Cache cache = ms.getCache();  
        if (cache != null) {  
            flushCacheIfRequired(ms);  
            cache.getReadWriteLock().readLock().lock();  
            try {  
                if (ms.isUseCache() && resultHandler ==null) {  
                    CacheKey key = createCacheKey(ms, parameterObject, rowBounds);  
                    final List cachedList = (List)cache.getObject(key);  
                    if (cachedList != null) {  
                        return cachedList;  
                    } else {  
                        List list = delegate.query(ms,parameterObject, rowBounds, resultHandler);  
                        tcm.putObject(cache,key, list);  
                        return list;  
                    }  
                } else {  
                    return delegate.query(ms,parameterObject, rowBounds, resultHandler);  
                }  
            } finally {  
                cache.getReadWriteLock().readLock().unlock();  
            }
        }  
    }  
    return delegate.query(ms,parameterObject, rowBounds, resultHandler);  
}
                                                          • æ™®é€šExecutor

                                                          æœ‰3ç±»ï¼Œä»–ä»¬éƒ½ç»§æ‰¿äºBaseExecutorï¼ŒBatchExecutorä¸“é—¨ç”¨äºæ‰§è¡Œæ‰¹é‡sqlæ“ä½œï¼ŒReuseExecutorä¼šé‡ç”¨statementæ‰§è¡Œsqlæ“ä½œï¼ŒSimpleExecutoråªæ˜¯ç®€å•æ‰§è¡Œsqlæ²¡æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆç‰¹åˆ«çš„ã€‚ä¸‹é¢ä»¥SimpleExecutorä¸ºä¾‹ï¼š

                                                          public List doQuery(MappedStatement ms, Object parameter, RowBounds rowBounds,ResultHandler resultHandler) throws SQLException {  
    Statement stmt = null;  
    try {  
        Configuration configuration = ms.getConfiguration();  
        StatementHandler handler = configuration.newStatementHandler(this, ms,parameter, rowBounds,resultHandler);  
        stmt =prepareStatement(handler);  
        returnhandler.query(stmt, resultHandler);  
    } finally {  
        closeStatement(stmt);  
    }  
}

                                                          ç„¶åï¼Œé€šè¿‡ä¸€å±‚ä¸€å±‚çš„è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆä¼šæ¥åˆ°doQueryæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œ è¿™å„¿å’±ä»¬å°±éšä¾¿æ‰¾ä¸ªExcutorçœ‹çœ‹doQueryæ–¹æ³•çš„å®ç°å§ï¼Œæˆ‘è¿™å„¿é€‰æ‹©äº†SimpleExecutor:

                                                            public <E> List<E> doQuery(MappedStatement ms, Object parameter, RowBounds rowBounds, ResultHandler resultHandler, BoundSql boundSql) throws SQLException {
    Statement stmt = null;
    try {
      Configuration configuration = ms.getConfiguration();
      StatementHandler handler = configuration.newStatementHandler(wrapper, ms, parameter, rowBounds, resultHandler, boundSql);
      stmt = prepareStatement(handler, ms.getStatementLog());
      //StatementHandlerå°è£…äº†Statement, è®© StatementHandler å»å¤„ç†
      return handler.<E>query(stmt, resultHandler);
    } finally {
      closeStatement(stmt);
    }
  }

                                                          Mybatiså†…ç½®çš„ExecutorTypeæœ‰3ç§ï¼Œé»˜è®¤çš„æ˜¯simpleï¼Œè¯¥æ¨¡å¼ä¸‹å®ƒä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªè¯­å¥çš„æ‰§è¡Œåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„é¢„å¤„ç†è¯­å¥ï¼Œå•æ¡æäº¤sqlï¼›è€Œbatchæ¨¡å¼é‡å¤ä½¿ç”¨å·²ç»é¢„å¤„ç†çš„è¯­å¥ï¼Œ å¹¶ä¸”æ‰¹é‡æ‰§è¡Œæ‰€æœ‰æ›´æ–°è¯­å¥ï¼Œæ˜¾ç„¶batchæ€§èƒ½å°†æ›´ä¼˜ï¼›

                                                          ä½†batchæ¨¡å¼ä¹Ÿæœ‰è‡ªå·±çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚åœ¨Insertæ“ä½œæ—¶ï¼Œåœ¨äº‹åŠ¡æ²¡æœ‰æäº¤ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œæ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰åŠæ³•è·å–åˆ°è‡ªå¢çš„idï¼Œè¿™åœ¨æŸå‹æƒ…å½¢ä¸‹æ˜¯ä¸ç¬¦åˆä¸šåŠ¡è¦æ±‚çš„ï¼›

                                                          é€šè¿‡èµ°ç å’Œç ”è¯»springç›¸å…³æ–‡ä»¶å‘ç°ï¼Œåœ¨åŒä¸€äº‹åŠ¡ä¸­batchæ¨¡å¼å’Œsimpleæ¨¡å¼ä¹‹é—´æ— æ³•è½¬æ¢ï¼Œç”±äºæœ¬é¡¹ç›®ä¸€å¼€å§‹é€‰æ‹©äº†simpleæ¨¡å¼ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç¢°åˆ°éœ€è¦æ‰¹é‡æ›´æ–°æ—¶ï¼Œåªèƒ½åœ¨å•ç‹¬çš„äº‹åŠ¡ä¸­è¿›è¡Œï¼›

                                                          //ä»springæ³¨å…¥åŸæœ‰çš„sqlSessionTemplate
@Autowired
private SqlSessionTemplate sqlSessionTemplate;
 
public void testInsertBatchByTrue() {
    //æ–°è·å–ä¸€ä¸ªæ¨¡å¼ä¸ºBATCHï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤ä¸ºfalseçš„session
    //å¦‚æœè‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤è®¾ç½®ä¸ºtrue,å°†æ— æ³•æ§åˆ¶æäº¤çš„æ¡æ•°ï¼Œæ”¹ä¸ºæœ€åç»Ÿä¸€æäº¤ï¼Œå¯èƒ½å¯¼è‡´å†…å­˜æº¢å‡º
    SqlSession session = sqlSessionTemplate.getSqlSessionFactory().openSession(ExecutorType.BATCH, false);
    //é€šè¿‡æ–°çš„sessionè·å–mapper
    fooMapper = session.getMapper(FooMapper.class);
    int size = 10000;
    try {
        for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
            Foo foo = new Foo();
            foo.setName(String.valueOf(System.currentTimeMillis()));
            fooMapper.insert(foo);
            if (i % 1000 == 0 || i == size - 1) {
                //æ‰‹åŠ¨æ¯1000ä¸ªä¸€æäº¤ï¼Œæäº¤åæ— æ³•å›æ»š
                session.commit();
                //æ¸…ç†ç¼“å­˜ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢æº¢å‡º
                session.clearCache();
            }
        }
    } catch (Exception e) {
        //æ²¡æœ‰æäº¤çš„æ•°æ®å¯ä»¥å›æ»š
        session.rollback();
    } finally {
        session.close();
    }
}

                                                          ä¸Šè¿°ä»£ç æ²¡æœ‰ä½¿ç”¨springçš„äº‹åŠ¡ï¼Œæ”¹æ‰‹åŠ¨æ§åˆ¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœå’ŒåŸspringäº‹åŠ¡ä¸€èµ·ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå°†æ— æ³•å›æ»šï¼Œå¿…é¡»æ³¨æ„ï¼Œæœ€å¥½å•ç‹¬ä½¿ç”¨ï¼›

                                                          # 4. StatementHandler

                                                          å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼ŒExecutoræœ¬è´¨ä¸Šä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸ªç”©æ‰‹æŒæŸœï¼Œå…·ä½“çš„äº‹æƒ…åŸæ¥æ˜¯StatementHandleræ¥å®Œæˆçš„ã€‚å½“Executorå°†æŒ‡æŒ¥æ£’äº¤ç»™StatementHandleråï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥çš„å·¥ä½œå°±æ˜¯StatementHandlerçš„äº‹äº†ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬å…ˆçœ‹çœ‹StatementHandleræ˜¯å¦‚ä½•åˆ›å»ºçš„ï¼š

                                                          public StatementHandler newStatementHandler(Executor executor, MappedStatementmappedStatement,  
        ObjectparameterObject, RowBounds rowBounds, ResultHandler resultHandler) {  
    StatementHandler statementHandler = new RoutingStatementHandler(executor, mappedStatement,parameterObject,rowBounds, resultHandler);  
    statementHandler = (StatementHandler) interceptorChain.pluginAll(statementHandler);  
    return statementHandler;
}

                                                          å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°æ¯æ¬¡åˆ›å»ºçš„StatementHandleréƒ½æ˜¯RoutingStatementHandlerï¼Œå®ƒåªæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ†å‘è€…ï¼Œä»–ä¸€ä¸ªå±æ€§delegateç”¨äºæŒ‡å®šç”¨å“ªç§å…·ä½“çš„StatementHandlerã€‚å¯é€‰çš„StatementHandleræœ‰SimpleStatementHandlerã€PreparedStatementHandlerå’ŒCallableStatementHandlerä¸‰ç§ã€‚é€‰ç”¨å“ªç§åœ¨mapperé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶çš„æ¯ä¸ªstatementé‡ŒæŒ‡å®šï¼Œé»˜è®¤çš„æ˜¯PreparedStatementHandlerã€‚åŒæ—¶è¿˜è¦æ³¨æ„åˆ°StatementHandleræ˜¯å¯ä»¥è¢«æ‹¦æˆªå™¨æ‹¦æˆªçš„ï¼Œå’ŒExecutorä¸€æ ·ï¼Œè¢«æ‹¦æˆªå™¨æ‹¦æˆªåçš„å¯¹åƒæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡ã€‚ç”±äºmybatisæ²¡æœ‰å®ç°æ•°æ®åº“çš„ç‰©ç†åˆ†é¡µï¼Œä¼—å¤šç‰©ç†åˆ†é¡µçš„å®ç°éƒ½æ˜¯åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªåœ°æ–¹ä½¿ç”¨æ‹¦æˆªå™¨å®ç°çš„ï¼Œæœ¬æ–‡ä½œè€…ä¹Ÿå®ç°äº†ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ†é¡µæ‹¦æˆªå™¨ï¼Œåœ¨åç»­çš„ç« èŠ‚ä¼šåˆ†äº«ç»™å¤§å®¶ï¼Œæ•¬è¯·æœŸå¾…ã€‚

                                                          StatementHandleråˆ›å»ºåéœ€è¦æ‰§è¡Œä¸€äº›åˆå§‹æ“ä½œï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚statementçš„å¼€å¯å’Œå‚æ•°è®¾ç½®ã€å¯¹äºPreparedStatementè¿˜éœ€è¦æ‰§è¡Œå‚æ•°çš„è®¾ç½®æ“ä½œç­‰ã€‚ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                          private Statement prepareStatement(StatementHandler handler) throws SQLException {  
    Statement stmt;  
    Connection connection = transaction.getConnection();  
    stmt =handler.prepare(connection);  
    handler.parameterize(stmt);  
    return stmt;  
}

                                                          statementçš„å¼€å¯å’Œå‚æ•°è®¾ç½®æ²¡ä»€ä¹ˆç‰¹åˆ«çš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œhandler.parameterizeå€’æ˜¯å¯ä»¥çœ‹çœ‹æ˜¯æ€ä¹ˆå›äº‹ã€‚handler.parameterizeé€šè¿‡è°ƒç”¨ParameterHandlerçš„setParameterså®Œæˆå‚æ•°çš„è®¾ç½®ï¼ŒParameterHandleréšç€StatementHandlerçš„åˆ›å»ºè€Œåˆ›å»ºï¼Œé»˜è®¤çš„å®ç°æ˜¯DefaultParameterHandlerï¼š

                                                          public ParameterHandler newParameterHandler(MappedStatement mappedStatement, Object parameterObject, BoundSql boundSql) {  
   ParameterHandler parameterHandler = new DefaultParameterHandler(mappedStatement,parameterObject,boundSql);  
   parameterHandler = (ParameterHandler) interceptorChain.pluginAll(parameterHandler);  
   return parameterHandler;  
}

                                                          åŒExecutorå’ŒStatementHandlerä¸€æ ·ï¼ŒParameterHandlerä¹Ÿæ˜¯å¯ä»¥è¢«æ‹¦æˆªçš„ã€‚DefaultParameterHandleré‡Œè®¾ç½®å‚æ•°çš„ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                          public void setParameters(PreparedStatement ps) throws SQLException {  
    ErrorContext.instance().activity("settingparameters").object(mappedStatement.getParameterMap().getId());  
    List<ParameterMapping> parameterMappings = boundSql.getParameterMappings();  
    if(parameterMappings != null) {  
        MetaObject metaObject = parameterObject == null ? null :configuration.newMetaObject(parameterObject);  
        for (int i = 0; i< parameterMappings.size(); i++) {  
            ParameterMapping parameterMapping = parameterMappings.get(i);  
            if(parameterMapping.getMode() != ParameterMode.OUT) {  
                Object value;  
                String propertyName = parameterMapping.getProperty();  
                PropertyTokenizer prop = newPropertyTokenizer(propertyName);  
                if (parameterObject == null) {  
                    value = null;  
                } else if (typeHandlerRegistry.hasTypeHandler(parameterObject.getClass())){  
                    value = parameterObject;  
                } else if (boundSql.hasAdditionalParameter(propertyName)){  
                    value = boundSql.getAdditionalParameter(propertyName);  
                } else if(propertyName.startsWith(ForEachSqlNode.ITEM_PREFIX)  
                        && boundSql.hasAdditionalParameter(prop.getName())){  
                    value = boundSql.getAdditionalParameter(prop.getName());  
                    if (value != null) {  
                        value = configuration.newMetaObject(value).getValue(propertyName.substring(prop.getName().length()));  
                    }  
                } else {  
                    value = metaObject == null ? null :metaObject.getValue(propertyName);  
                }  
                TypeHandler typeHandler = parameterMapping.getTypeHandler();  
                if (typeHandler == null) {  
                   throw new ExecutorException("Therewas no TypeHandler found for parameter " + propertyName  + " of statement " + mappedStatement.getId());  
                }  
                typeHandler.setParameter(ps, i + 1, value,parameterMapping.getJdbcType());  
            }  
  
        }  
  
    }  
}

                                                          è¿™é‡Œé¢æœ€é‡è¦çš„ä¸€å¥å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯æœ€åä¸€å¥ä»£ç ï¼Œå®ƒçš„ä½œç”¨æ˜¯ç”¨åˆé€‚çš„TypeHandlerå®Œæˆå‚æ•°çš„è®¾ç½®ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯åˆé€‚çš„TypeHandlerå‘¢ï¼Œå®ƒåˆæ˜¯å¦‚ä½•å†³æ–­å‡ºæ¥çš„å‘¢ï¼ŸBaseStatementHandlerçš„æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•é‡Œæœ‰è¿™ä¹ˆä¸€å¥ï¼š

                                                          this.boundSql= mappedStatement.getBoundSql(parameterObject);

                                                          å®ƒè§¦å‘äº†sql çš„è§£æï¼Œåœ¨è§£æsqlçš„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼ŒTypeHandlerä¹Ÿè¢«å†³æ–­å‡ºæ¥äº†ï¼Œå†³æ–­çš„åŸåˆ™å°±æ˜¯æ ¹æ®å‚æ•°çš„ç±»å‹å’Œå‚æ•°å¯¹åº”çš„JDBCç±»å‹å†³å®šä½¿ç”¨å“ªä¸ªTypeHandlerã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ï¼šå‚æ•°ç±»å‹æ˜¯Stringçš„è¯å°±ç”¨StringTypeHandlerï¼Œå‚æ•°ç±»å‹æ˜¯æ•´æ•°çš„è¯å°±ç”¨IntegerTypeHandlerç­‰ã€‚

                                                          å‚æ•°è®¾ç½®å®Œæ¯•åï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œæ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œï¼ˆupdateæˆ–queryï¼‰ã€‚å¦‚æœæ˜¯queryæœ€åè¿˜æœ‰ä¸ªæŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æœçš„å¤„ç†è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚

                                                          æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œå’±ä»¬çœ‹çœ‹StatementHandler çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå®ç°ç±» PreparedStatementHandlerï¼ˆè¿™ä¹Ÿæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬æœ€å¸¸ç”¨çš„ï¼Œå°è£…çš„æ˜¯PreparedStatementï¼‰, çœ‹çœ‹å®ƒä½¿æ€ä¹ˆå»å¤„ç†çš„ï¼š

                                                            public <E> List<E> query(Statement statement, ResultHandler resultHandler) throws SQLException {
    // åˆ°æ­¤ï¼ŒåŸå½¢æ¯•éœ²ï¼Œ PreparedStatement, è¿™ä¸ªå¤§å®¶éƒ½å·²ç»æ»šç“œçƒ‚ç†Ÿäº†å§
    PreparedStatement ps = (PreparedStatement) statement;
    ps.execute();
    // ç»“æœäº¤ç»™äº†ResultSetHandler å»å¤„ç†
    return resultSetHandler.<E> handleResultSets(ps);
  }

                                                          ç»“æœå¤„ç†ä½¿ç”¨ResultSetHandleræ¥å®Œæˆï¼Œé»˜è®¤çš„ResultSetHandleræ˜¯FastResultSetHandlerï¼Œå®ƒåœ¨åˆ›å»ºStatementHandleræ—¶ä¸€èµ·åˆ›å»ºï¼Œä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                          public ResultSetHandler newResultSetHandler(Executor executor, MappedStatement mappedStatement,  
RowBounds rowBounds, ParameterHandler parameterHandler, ResultHandler resultHandler, BoundSql boundSql) {  
   ResultSetHandler resultSetHandler = mappedStatement.hasNestedResultMaps() ? newNestedResultSetHandler(executor, mappedStatement, parameterHandler, resultHandler, boundSql, rowBounds): new FastResultSetHandler(executor,mappedStatement, parameterHandler, resultHandler, boundSql, rowBounds);  
   resultSetHandler = (ResultSetHandler) interceptorChain.pluginAll(resultSetHandler);  
   return resultSetHandler;  
}

                                                          å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºResultSetHandlerä¹Ÿæ˜¯å¯ä»¥è¢«æ‹¦æˆªçš„ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç¼–å†™è‡ªå·±çš„æ‹¦æˆªå™¨æ”¹å˜ResultSetHandlerçš„é»˜è®¤è¡Œä¸ºã€‚ResultSetHandlerå†…éƒ¨ä¸€æ¡è®°å½•ä¸€æ¡è®°å½•çš„å¤„ç†ï¼Œåœ¨å¤„ç†æ¯æ¡è®°å½•çš„æ¯ä¸€åˆ—æ—¶ä¼šè°ƒç”¨TypeHandlerè½¬æ¢ç»“æœï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                          protected boolean applyAutomaticMappings(ResultSet rs, List<String> unmappedColumnNames,MetaObject metaObject) throws SQLException {  
    boolean foundValues = false;  
    for (String columnName : unmappedColumnNames) {  
        final String property = metaObject.findProperty(columnName);  
        if (property!= null) {  
            final ClasspropertyType =metaObject.getSetterType(property);  
            if (typeHandlerRegistry.hasTypeHandler(propertyType)) {  
                final TypeHandler typeHandler = typeHandlerRegistry.getTypeHandler(propertyType);  
                final Object value = typeHandler.getResult(rs,columnName);  
                if (value != null) {  
                    metaObject.setValue(property, value);  
                    foundValues = true;  
                }  
            }  
        }  
    }  
    return foundValues;  
}
